meanings.sent1: The unstandardized test allowed students to show their unique skills.
meanings.sent2: Her unstandardized approach to painting always surprised her audience.
meanings.sent3: The unstandardized cupcakes were all different shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent4: His unstandardized methods of teaching opened up new possibilities for learning.
meanings.sent5: The unstandardized garden was a beautiful mix of colors and textures.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to a standard or norm
meanings.sent1: The unstandardized rules in the game made it more exciting.
meanings.sent2: Their unstandardized fashion sense always turned heads.
meanings.sent3: The unstandardized schedule led to some unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her unstandardized opinions challenged the status quo.
meanings.sent5: The unstandardized weather kept everyone on their toes.
